item.title: Starting a Blog in 2020
item.description: I’m starting a blog. It sounds outdated, but it gives me a reason to practice long-form writing, along with the added pressure of publishing to the real-world. I haven’t really identified an audience, nor a plan for content, but I expect it will cover a range of things that interest me. Rachel Thomas of Fast.ai wrote an excellent article on the benefits of writing a blog, covering things you can gain from writing a blog, which I won’t rehash here.
